_sText:
This map uses the layout of "knas_speedcastle_css", which I enjoy playing quite a lot. My own version has a different theme and uses more possibilities or the source engine concerning lightning and amount of brushes, etc, while still being playable at decent fps rates.

I used the pk01 texture pack, which can be freely used and modified. I tuned the normal maps a bit and included the ones needed for the map in the bsp file, so no stuff like installing the materials is needed.
A NAV File for the bots is included in the bsp.

I hope you will enjoy playing this map, which I would claim to be a mix of a fun map and a optically quite serious map, though it has a unrealistic theme, of course.

The final version features some improvements over the beta, having taken into account the feedback I had recieved:

+ 3D Skybox (nothing great ;) )
+ you won't get stuck at ground level lights anymore
+ the map is a little bit brighter, less really dark areas (read the note further down concerning brightness)
+ small bugfixes, I found a few misaligned textures
+ nicer outer walls 

Otherwise, I got mostly positive feedback on the map in general. I would be VERY happy if you rated the final version, too :-)

(and of course it is the dream of a mapper to see his map played on a server with some players on it :-) )

NOTE ON BRIGHTNESS: The screenshots are quite dark and don't really show what I see on my screen. It seems the screenshot function tunes down the brightness, I do not know. I didn't want to make them brighter in Photoshop. I adivse you to adjust the brightness manually and turn on HDR, the map is bright enough then.
